title: Delhi Police raids locations linked to NewsClick, its journalists
selftext:
A Special Cell of Delhi Police on Tuesday raided at least 30 locations linked to NewsClick and its journalists.  Police recovered the dumped data from laptops and mobile phones of some journalists of NewsClick. The Special Cell has registered a new case and started the investigation, officials said.

[https://www.cnbctv18.com/india/delhi-police-raids-locations-linked-to-newsclick-its-journalists-arrests-17930091.htm](https://www.cnbctv18.com/india/delhi-police-raids-locations-linked-to-newsclick-its-journalists-arrests-17930091.htm)
